'''Nonso Anozie''' is a British actor who has appeared in films including ''[[wikipedia:The Last Legion|The Last Legion]]'', ''[[wikipedia:Atonement (film)|Atonement]]'', ''[[wikipedia:RocknRolla|RocknRolla]]'', ''[[wikipedia:Nanny McPhee and the Big Bang|Nanny McPhee and the Big Bang]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Conan the Barbarian (2011 film)|Conan the Barbarian]]''. On stage, he is noted for being one of the youngest actors to portray ''[[wikipedia:King Lear|King Lear]]'' and won the [[wikipedia:Ian Charleson Award|Ian Charleson Award]] in 2005 for his portrayal of ''[[wikipedia:Othello|Othello]]''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing the role of [[Xaro Xhoan Daxos]] and was officially announced in the role on 2 August 2011. He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]].
